exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Classic chest exercise for building mass and strength
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, grip bar slightly wider than shoulders, lower to chest, press up

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, press dumbbells up and together

exercises.name: Decline Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on decline bench, grip bar, lower to lower chest, press up

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.description: Isolation exercise for chest stretch and contraction
exercises.instructions: Lie flat, arms extended, lower dumbbells in arc motion, squeeze chest to return

exercises.name: Cable Crossover
exercises.description: Great for chest definition and constant tension
exercises.instructions: Stand between cables, bring handles together in front of chest

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Hands shoulder-width, lower chest to floor, push back up

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.description: Compound movement for chest and triceps
exercises.instructions: Lean forward on dip bars, lower body, push up

exercises.name: Pec Deck Machine
exercises.instructions: Sit, grip handles, bring arms together in front

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: King of compound exercises for overall back development
exercises.instructions: Grip bar, keep back straight, drive through heels, stand up

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.description: Builds thickness in the middle back
exercises.instructions: Bend over, pull bar to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, pull chest to bar, lower with control

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Grip bar wide, pull to upper chest, control the return

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Sit, grip handle, pull to midsection, squeeze back

exercises.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.description: Unilateral back exercise for muscle balance
exercises.instructions: Support on bench, pull dumbbell to hip, lower with control

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.description: Builds thickness in the middle back
exercises.instructions: Straddle bar, grip handle, pull to chest

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.description: Great for rear delts and upper back health
exercises.instructions: Pull rope to face level, externally rotate at end

exercises.name: Hyperextensions
exercises.instructions: Lock feet, lower upper body, raise to parallel

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar overhead from shoulders, lock out arms

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Allows natural range of motion for shoulders
exercises.instructions: Press dumbbells overhead, bring together at top

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Isolation for side delts and shoulder width
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells to sides until parallel to floor

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells in front to shoulder height

exercises.name: Rear Delt Flyes
exercises.instructions: Bend over, raise dumbbells to sides

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: Hits all three delt heads in one motion
exercises.instructions: Start palms facing you, rotate as you press up

exercises.name: Upright Row
exercises.instructions: Pull bar up to chin level, elbows high

exercises.name: Shrugs
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, shrug shoulders up

exercises.name: Barbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl bar up, keep elbows stationary

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curl
exercises.description: Allows supination for full bicep contraction
exercises.instructions: Curl dumbbells up, rotate palms up as you curl

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl with palms facing each other

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instructions: Rest arms on pad, curl bar up

exercises.name: Cable Curl
exercises.instructions: Stand at low cable, curl handle up

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdown
exercises.instructions: Push bar down, keep elbows at sides

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.instructions: Lower bar to forehead, extend arms

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.description: Stretches and targets long head of triceps
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, extend

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.instructions: Keep body upright, lower and press up

exercises.name: Close Grip Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Grip bar narrowly, press up

exercises.name: Wrist Curls
exercises.instructions: Rest forearms on bench, curl wrists up

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.instructions: Bar on upper back, squat down, drive up

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.instructions: Bar on front delts, squat down, drive up

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Press platform away, lower with control

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.instructions: Extend legs, squeeze at top

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl pad toward glutes

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips, lower bar along legs

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward into lunge, alternate legs

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Rear foot elevated, squat on front leg

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Rise onto toes, lower with control

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Sit, raise heels, lower with control

exercises.name: Hip Thrusts
exercises.instructions: Back on bench, drive hips up with bar

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.description: Great for squat form and depth
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat deep

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold push-up position on forearms

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Curl shoulders toward hips

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to parallel

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.instructions: Kneel at cable, crunch down toward floor

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit, lean back, rotate side to side

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.instructions: Roll wheel out, maintain flat back, roll back

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, alternate extending opposite arm and leg

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: In push-up position, alternate driving knees to chest

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Support on one forearm, hold body straight

exercises.name: Treadmill Running
exercises.instructions: Set pace and incline, run for desired duration

exercises.name: Stationary Bike
exercises.instructions: Set resistance, pedal at desired intensity

exercises.name: Rowing Machine
exercises.instructions: Push with legs, pull with arms, return

exercises.name: Elliptical
exercises.instructions: Step on, move in elliptical motion

exercises.name: Stair Climber
exercises.instructions: Climb stairs at desired pace

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.instructions: Jump over rope, maintain rhythm

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.instructions: Squat, jump to plank, push-up, jump up

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.instructions: Jump onto box, step down, repeat

exercises.name: Battle Ropes
exercises.instructions: Create waves with heavy ropes

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell to shoulder height
